main event: A series of briefings regarding the capability and funding for the investigation of UFO sightings took place from 11-15 July 1960, involving various members of the House Armed Services and Science and Astronautics Committees.
interesting points: Mr. Robert Smart recommended increased capability for ATIC to conduct UFO investigations,The Air Force disclosed limitations in their current investigative capabilities at the briefings,More than 12,000 UFO cases are estimated to require investigation each year,It was emphasized that additional personnel and funding were necessary for a thorough investigation,Concerns were raised about public interest and pressure for additional hearings on UFO matters.
witness description: Members of the House Armed Services and Science and Astronautics Committees, and USAF personnel
